name: Cannibal
ability: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

execution.description: The Cannibal has the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, the Cannibal is poisoned until a good player dies by execution.
execution.label: Gain ability of executee

information.customMessage: The Cannibal gains the ability of the executee.
